title: Majestic Oman Five-Star Escape with Spectacular Canyon Views
description: Immerse yourself in an incredible landscape with a five-star stay at the breathtaking Anantara Al Jabal Al Akhdar Resort, one of the worldâ€™s highest resorts. Surrounded by the seemingly endless Oman desert, this world-class resort is the perfect base for thrilling outdoor adventures - or simply sit back and enjoy this luxe oasis with majestic canyon views on all sides. Breathe in the mountain air, take a refreshing dip in the canyon-edge pool, pamper yourself at the Anantara Spa and indulge at one of the five onsite restaurants and bars.
